request_body.message: can you send a notification to security about my new client coming today at 5 PM

response_json.reply:
I can’t send notifications directly. I can draft the notification for you — please confirm the details below or provide any missing info:

Required:
- Client name:
- Date (if not today):
- Time: 5:00 PM (confirmed)
- Location/building/office:
- Security contact method (email, SMS, internal system) and recipient address/phone:
- Any special instructions (ID check, escort, parking, access code):

Preview template I will send once you confirm:
"Security Alert: New client [Client name] will arrive on [Date] at 5:00 PM at [Location]. Please be prepared to [special instructions]. Contact [your name/phone] for questions."

Reply with the details and whether you want me to adjust the wording.
